plot: PEREGRINE and his little sister MARLA live in a house in an affluent neighbourhood. LIONEL, their pet, a cross between a ringed-tail lemur and a golden tamarin, is an escapee from a cosmetics lab who likes to spit when in disagreement.
plot_en: PEREGRINE and his little sister MARLA live in a house in an affluent neighbourhood. LIONEL, their pet, a cross between a ringed-tail lemur and a golden tamarin, is an escapee from a cosmetics lab who likes to spit when in disagreement.

title: Living with Lionel
